data.name: Islet Hell
data.detailed_description: This is a flight simulator in which you control a plane flying over a sea of small islands. The game is organized in a series of 10 levels of increasing difficulty. You have to shoot down all enemy planes and sink all enemy ships in order to win at each level. A radar at the bottom right of the screen allows you to locate all enemies as red dots with regard to your position, which is a black dot at the middle of the radar. Navigate the plane with the arrow keys in typical flight-simulator style: Left and Right for roll and Up and Down for pitch motion. Shoot with the space-bar. That is all! You have no bombs so you have to sink ships by simply shooting at them. However, they can fire missiles at you.
data.about_the_game: This is a flight simulator in which you control a plane flying over a sea of small islands. The game is organized in a series of 10 levels of increasing difficulty. You have to shoot down all enemy planes and sink all enemy ships in order to win at each level. A radar at the bottom right of the screen allows you to locate all enemies as red dots with regard to your position, which is a black dot at the middle of the radar. Navigate the plane with the arrow keys in typical flight-simulator style: Left and Right for roll and Up and Down for pitch motion. Shoot with the space-bar. That is all! You have no bombs so you have to sink ships by simply shooting at them. However, they can fire missiles at you.
data.short_description: Fly your plane over an archipelago of small islands and destroy all enemy planes and boats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Support
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: Mojave

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Support
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4.3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM

  • Storage: 20 MB available space

Recommended:

data.legal_notice:
This software does not collect nor store any information on the players.

This software uses these sounds from freesound:

- "Plane.m4a" by smont154
- "Minigun" by Breviceps
- "Splash, Jumping, D.wav" by InspectorJ
- "explosion_012.mp3" by deleted_user_5405837
